channel.title: Tips on Goldydocs
channel.description: Recent content in Tips on Goldydocs

item.title: How-to-solve-npm-i-e401
item.description: When we run npm getting-started or npm i under Twin or ktw new workspace YOUR_WORKSPACE, we most likely encounter the error 401: not having permission issue, this is due to no access to Azure devops. Solution: for example, if the package.json has below dependencies: "dependencies": { "@azure-tools/azcopy-node": "^2.5.0", "@kognitwin/cli": "^1.0.473", "@kognitwin/common": "^1.0.473", "@kognitwin/import-task-configs": "^1.0.365", "@kognitwin/sdk": "^1.0.473", "@kognitwin/task-configs": "^1.0.411", "lodash": "^4.17.20" }, Remove all @kognitwin/* dependencies since we do not have access.

item.title: HowtodebugNodeJs
item.description: 在执行这行命令:ktw import -s root in /tutorial/hello or /Twin.KDI，如果遇到如下问题 (附nodejs调试方法) 1）在/Twin/cli/下全局搜索’result:’,定位到是这里报错 VS Code, Terminal - New Terminal, 选择Twin repo(要选择调试代码的repo，否则进不了断点) 3)javascript debug terminal，选择Twin.KDI or /tutorial/hello/ (选择其他的会报错 - [ERROR] Import command can’t be run outside of a ktw workspace.) 4)标记断点 断点标记 vs debugger 两种方式都可以 VSCode 行号左侧的小红点就是断点标记，表示程序执行到这一行就会停下来 5)执行ktw import -s root进入断点 问题出在context.client.apiUrl - ‘https://hello.localdev.me/api/' 7)发现/tutorial/hello/的ktw运行环境ktw.json，默认为https://hello.localdev.me/api/,但是本地并没有启动这个服务 8)通过ktw帮助命令行， ktw import -h， 可以通过-e指定运行环境 ktw import -s root -e local
